meanings.definition: A person who is present at an event or gathering.
meanings.sent2: The attendee signed in at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The attendee at the party danced all night.
meanings.sent4: The attendee in the crowd stood out with their bright outfit.
meanings.sent5: The attendee's presence lit up the room.

meanings.definition: One who attends or is present at a particular place or event.
meanings.sent1: Every attendee received a gift bag.
meanings.sent2: The attendee waited patiently in line.
meanings.sent3: The attendee at the zoo fed the giraffes.
meanings.sent4: The attendee in the front row cheered the loudest.
